md:
giải nghĩa từ "vain" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Vain (adjective)
	+ Meaning: Having or showing an excessive pride in one's appearance, accomplishments, etc.
	+ Vietnamese: Kiêu ngạo, tự phụ
	+ Example sentence: He's so vain, he spends hours in front of the mirror every day.
	+ Related words: arrogant, conceited, proud
	+ Antonyms: humble, modest, unassuming

* Vain (adverb)
	+ Meaning: Without success or result; unsuccessful
	+ Vietnamese: Vô ích, không thành công
	+ Example sentence: We tried to fix the car, but it was all in vain.
	+ Related words: futile, unsuccessful, fruitless
	+ Antonyms: successful, effective, fruitful

Note: The word "vain" can have different meanings depending on the context, so it's important to understand the nuances of the word to use it correctly.
